sentences.sContent: Vautrot has refereed in two World Cups.
sentences.sCn: 沃特罗特已经在两届世界杯比赛中担任过裁判。

remMethod.val: refer(参考； 征询) ＋ ee(表人) → 征询意见 → 仲裁者

words.tran: 参考，参照；涉及，提及；参考书目；介绍信；证明书
为…作鉴定；为…担任裁判（referee的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: to be the referee of a game

trans.tranCn: 裁判员；证明人，推荐人；仲裁者，调解者
trans.tranOther: someone who makes sure that the rules of a sport such as football,  basketball  , or  boxing  , are followed
